article.title: King Aerospace to Support Reconnaissance Aircraft
article.text: King Aerospace, Addison, Texas, was awarded a $40,259,260 firm-fixed price contract for continuation of contractor logistics support for the De Havilland Canada Dash 7 airborne reconnaissance low EO-5 aircraft. Work will be performed at Fort Bliss, Texas, with an estimated completion date of Dec. 31, 2015. Bids were solicited via the Internet, with one received. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance (Army) funds in the amount of $12,500,000 are being obligated at the time of the award. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal (Aviation), Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity (W58RGZ-15-C-0026).
